metadata.name: Brave Warrior
metadata.description:
Everywhere in the history of our country is full of influential, we have narrated their story in the form of a handmade artistic ring. This ring story of Bibi Maryam Bakhtiari, She was the brave warrior & one of her great achievements is the conquest of Tehran and Isfahan. The choice of the city of Isfahan as one of Bibi Maryam's conquests & its combination with her figure has been the general concept of our work. This ring is inspired by the construction of Khaju Bridge on the Zayandehrood River, which is one of the largest rivers in central Iran in the city of Isfahan. The construction of Khaju Bridge as the base of the ring & the large gem on the ring represent the Zayandehrood River & the small gems represent the continuous efforts & military of her troops to capture Isfahan & the symmetrical use of the statue of Bibi Maryam holding Khaju Bridge on her arms.
925 Silver
Aquamarine, Pearl, Zircon, Topaz
Handmade, 3D print, Enamel
*Winner of the auction will receive the physical ring
